name: Chain of Domination
data: It decreases the users strength like a god.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
